Objective

The goal of this project was to showcase a year’s worth of motion graphics work.

Art Direction

The intro and outro of this project incorporated footage and paper textures in order to add an extra level of dimension. A variety of techniques were employed to create an aged look to this piece.

Final Demo

The final piece successfully demonstrates the scope of motion work created in the prior year.

Valerie Bordeleau
